data:

Large language models (LLMs) have shown promise in vulnerability detection but 
often produce hallucinations and lack precise logical reasoning, leading to high false 
positive rates and limited practical trust. The core challenge lies in reconciling the

achieve both high accuracy and high explainability in vulnerability detection. Our key
